BackstoryDef.title: abductee
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was forcibly torn from [PAWN_possessive] parents during a starless raid.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] clings to fleeting memories of a time when [PAWN_pronoun] felt the comforting embrace of family, the warmth of laughter, and the unburdened joy of childhood, all before the nightmare of captivity and isolation began.

BackstoryDef.title: bloodbag
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From the moment of [PAWN_possessive] birth, [PAWN_nameDef] was condemned to an existence of eternal blood-draining.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] childhood unfolded as a never-ending abyss of darkness, a world in which [PAWN_pronoun] could only grasp the biting cold and unrelenting solitude.

BackstoryDef.title: butler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was meticulously groomed to excel in the abilities expected of the servant of a master.\n\nThe unyielding training regimen proved successful, shaping [PAWN_objective] into the ideal candidate to become the butler of one of the higher-ups in the faction's dark hierarchy.

BackstoryDef.title: fighter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was consigned to a brutal combat school mere months after [PAWN_possessive] birth.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] endured this harrowing trial of survival of the fittest by proving [PAWN_objective]self to be among the very best, forging a reputation as a tenacious and skilled fighter.

BackstoryDef.title: helper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] formative years within the confines of a growth vat, where [PAWN_possessive] agility was incessantly stimulated.\n\nThe simulation centered only on physical tasks, rendering [PAWN_objective] incapable in most other areas.

BackstoryDef.title: grunt
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a specialized growth vat, meticulously designed by the overseers to stimulate [PAWN_possessive] resilience and stamina.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] endured a relentless series of simulations, each inflicting violence, pain, and torture. This rigorous training was a preparation for [PAWN_possessive] future role as a shock troop.

BackstoryDef.title: test subject
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was subjected to a barrage of experimental therapies and mind-altering drugs from a tender age.\n\nThe endless testing took a toll on [PAWN_possessive] mind and body, but [PAWN_pronoun] managed to glean valuable knowledge from the facility overseers.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was conceived using anonymous genetic material and experienced extremely accelerated aging in a growth vat.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was immersed in a virtual reality simulation that provided valuable knowledge in certain areas but remained devoid of the love and warmth that other children know.
